QueryResult.text: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN frequency = 0 THEN expiration_date - 1 WHEN frequency = 1 THEN expiration_date - 7 WHEN frequency = 3 THEN ADD_MONTHS(expiration_date,-1) ELSE expiration_date END) ROLLOVER_DATE FROM prj_blb_slicerequests WHERE is_dwh_request = 1 AND request_name = 'DAILYRESOURCETIMECURVE'
